channel.title: CVE Feed for weblizar -- Lightbox slider – Responsive Lightbox Gallery

item.title: CVE-2024-49280|2024-10-17T19:37:56.500Z -- weblizar -- lightbox%20slider%20%E2%80%93%20responsive%20lightbox%20gallery
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Weblizar Lightbox slider – Responsive Lightbox Gallery allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Lightbox slider – Responsive Lightbox Gallery: from n/a through 1.10.0.
